00021 #ifndef FROG_SYS_SINGLETON_H
00022 #define FROG_SYS_SINGLETON_H
00023 
00024 
00025 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00026 #include <config.h>
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <frog/RuntimeException.h>
00031 #include <frog/NullPointerException.h>
00032 
00037 namespace frog
00038 {
00044     namespace sys
00045     {
00091         template <typename T>
00092             class Singleton
00093             {
00094               public:
00101                   Singleton()
00102                   {
00103                       if(this->singleton_)
00104                           throw RuntimeException(std::string(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__) + 
00105                                   ": There is already an existing instance of this object.");
00106                       singleton_ = static_cast<T*>( this );
00107                   }
00108 
00109                   /*
00110                    *
00111                    */
00112                   ~Singleton()
00113                   {
00114                       if(this->singleton_)
00115                           this->singleton_ = 0;
00116                   }
00117 
00124                   static T& getSingleton()
00125                   {
00126                       if(!singleton_)
00127                           throw NullPointerException(std::string(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__) + 
00128                                   ": Attempting to reference a non-existent object.");
00129                       return *singleton_;
00130                   }
00131 
00138                   static T* getSingletonPtr()
00139                   {
00140                       if(!singleton_)
00141                           throw NullPointerException(std::string(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__) + 
00142                                   ": Attempting to reference a non-existent object.");
00143                       return singleton_;
00144                   }
00145 
00146               protected:
00147                   static T* singleton_; 
00148             }; // Singleton tmpl
00149     } //ns sys
00150 } // ns frog
00151 
00152 #endif // FROG_SYS_SINGLETON_H
